description:
PHP (recursive acronym for PHP: Hypertext Preprocessor) open source general-purpose scripting language that is especially suited for web development and can be embedded into HTML.

  • This video course will introduce PHP to you by examples. you will be familiar with scripting languages after 10 min of this course.
  • This course will take about 3 hours for intermediate student.
  1. We will start by transferring your PC into a Server, so you can run your PHP code without need to register in any web hosting service.
  2. learning PHP syntax will be easy by implementing each step and monitor its result

This course will prepare you to make your own Content Management System.
title: Introduction to PHP In Arabic
